initiates a new transfer

Parameters:
[in]dstdestination address
[in]srcsource address
[in]aCntnumber of element (bytes) to transfer in 1st dimension
[in]bCntnumber of elements to transfer in 2nd dimension
[in]cCntnumber of elements to transfer in 3rd dimension
[in]srcBidxsource address increment in bytes for 1st dimension
[in]destBidxdestination address increment in bytes for 1st dimension
[in]srcCidxsource address increment in bytes for 2nd dimension
[in]destCidxdestination address increment in bytes for 2nd dimension
[in]chCntchannel number on which the transfer is to be initiated
[in]flagXferflag to indicate if a immediate transfer is to be initiated on this channel
